items.title: March of Dimes and Pampers® Award Scholarships to Nursing Students
items.description: Six exceptional nursing students are being recognized with March of Dimes Nursing Scholarships for their bold commitment to improving the health of moms and babies. With generous support from Pampers®, a March of Dimes partner for more than 25 years, the 2025 March of Dimes Nursing Scholarship Awards provide $10,000 to each recipient whose work tackles the maternal and infant health crisis and championing better health outcomes in communities across the US.

items.title: Italy's crib makers look to the elderly as births fall
